forum.content: Spend the past few years living in Sanxia, New Taipei City. Looking to meet up and have a chat in English! My Chinese is horrendous (about the same level as a toddler) so its English only unless you’re willing to help out 👩🏻‍🏫👨🏻‍🏫📚
forum.title: Genuinely looking for a friend, not a f***
